Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at The Rubens At The Palace, you'll be centrally located in London, steps from Royal Mews and Queen's Gallery. This 4-star hotel is close to Buckingham Palace and Big Ben.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 161 individually decorated guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature designer toiletries and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge). Additional amenities include babysitting/childcare, gift shops/newsstands, and wedding services.

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges. English breakfasts are available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, express check-in, and express check-out. This hotel has 9 meeting rooms available for events.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is Noon
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges. English breakfasts are available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at The Rubens At The Palace, you'll be centrally located in London, steps from Royal Mews and Queen's Gallery. This 4-star hotel is close to Buckingham Palace and Big Ben.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Royal Mews - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Queen's Gallery - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Victoria Palace Theatre - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Apollo Victoria Theatre - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
St. James Park - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Westminster Cathedral - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Buckingham Palace - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Green Park - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Wellington Arch - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
St. James's Square - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
St. James Palace - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Apsley House - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Hyde Park Corner - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Spencer House - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
The Mall - 1 km / 0.6 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 13.4 km / 8.3 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 21.4 km / 13.3 mi

The preferred airport for The Rubens At The Palace is London (LHR-Heathrow).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
